name: meta-ads-automation
description: Meta（Facebook/Instagram）広告の自動化ツールセット - 6つのMCPサーバー

scripts.install-all: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const modules = ['meta-ad-creative-mcp', 'meta-campaign-mcp', 'meta-budget-mcp', 'meta-experiment-mcp', 'meta-tracking-mcp', 'meta-report-mcp']; modules.forEach(m => { console.log('Installing', m); execSync('npm install', {cwd: m, stdio: 'inherit'}); });"
